Package com.xebisco.yield

Class ProcessSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xebisco.yield.YldSystem
      • com.xebisco.yield.ProcessSystem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MiddlePointSystem
    public abstract class ProcessSystem
extends YldSystem
    This is an implementation of YldSystem that process every Component in a YldScene instance.

      • process

        public abstract void process​(Component component,
                             float delta)
        Process all the components of a YldScene instance on every frame.
        Parameters:
        component - The actual component to be processed.
        delta - The time variation between the last frame and the actual one in seconds.
